        public void useNMapDataprovider(boolean enable)

      • setMapServerInfo

        protected void setMapServerInfo(int mapServerDomain,
                                java.lang.String mapCaller)
        Set informations for NAVER Map server. Note: This API should be invoked prior to any other server APIs.
        Parameters:
        mapServerDomain - Server domain for NAVER Map service. Do not set the real server during development process.
        mapCaller - Caller information for NAVER Map service. This is used by the server to identify clients, thus you should set it with values depending on your application name and version. Format: DeviceInfo_AppName_Verson DeviceInfo: device info such as WinCE, iPhone, iPod, android, etc. AppName: application name such as NamverMap, NaverBlog, wingbus, me2day, etc. Version: application version

      • setTileCachesInStorage

        public void setTileCachesInStorage(boolean enable)
        Set tile caches in storage. Note: This API should be invoked prior to any other server APIs.
        Parameters:
        enable - true to cache tiles in storage, otherwise false. Default is false, i.e. Tiles are not cached in storage.

      • requestMapAppInfoWithAppName

        public void requestMapAppInfoWithAppName(java.lang.String appName,
                                         android.os.Handler handler,
                                         NMapView mapView,
                                         boolean skipInitHandler)
        Request server domain informations for tile images. Note: This API should be invoked prior to display NMapView.
        Parameters:
        appName - application name which uses NMapViewer library.

      • requestMapAppInfoWithApiKey

        public void requestMapAppInfoWithApiKey(java.lang.String apiKey,
                                        android.os.Handler handler,
                                        NMapView mapView,
                                        boolean skipInitHandler)
        Request server domain informations for tile images. Note: This API should be invoked prior to display NMapView.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - registered key for Open NMapViewer library.

      • findPlacemarkAtLocation

        public void findPlacemarkAtLocation(double longitude,
                                    double latitude,
                                    android.os.Handler handler)
        Request a reverse geocoding (address lookup) corresponding to the location in GRS coordinates. The term geocoding generally refers to translating a human-readable address into a location on a map. The process of doing the converse, translating a location on the map into a human-readable address, is known as reverse geocoding.
        Parameters:
        longitude - longitude coordinate.
        latitude - latitude coordinate.

      • handleMessage

        public boolean handleMessage(android.os.Message msg,
                             android.os.Handler handler,
                             NMapView mapView,
                             NMapActivity.OnDataProviderListener listener)
